data.title: Death notices and funeral announcements from The Chronicle Newcastle July 29 to August 4
data.meta_description: A selection of tributes to people from around the North East who have passed away in the past few weeks
data.text:
Announcing the passing of a loved one in local news media is a long standing tradition and we are proud of the trust placed in us to make these important announcements. Every notice published to our newspaper and news site also appears on funeral-notices.co.uk - the UK’s number one site for death notices and memoriams.

Every notice remains online forever providing friends and families with a lifelong tribute to their loved one, a safe place online to share memories, add tributes, photographs and make donations in memory.

Each week we pay tribute to the loved ones remembered in our area with a funeral notice and online tribute page. To read the latest announcements and add tributes to those from our area who have passed away, click here.

Here are a selection of notices published earlier this week.

READ MORE: Tyneside children playing outdoors - 10 photographs from the 1960s to 1990s

Death Notices

Jean ANKERS

(Walker) Passed away unexpectedly but peacefully on 23rd July 2022, aged 73 years. Jean, beloved partner of the late Brian. Much loved mam of Cheryl, Mandy and Wendy. Dear mother in law of Andrew. Devoted nanna of all her grandchildren and great grandchildren. She will be sadly missed by all her family and friends. Funeral Service to take place at the West Road Crematorium on Wednesday 10th August 2022 at 12.45pm. Family flowers only please, donations if desired to the British Heart Foundation, a box will be available at the service. R.S. Scott, Sycamore Street, Wallsend, Tyne and Wear NE28 6TH Tel: 0191 2623880

Lorna ARMSTRONG (nee Graham)

(nee Graham) Crawcrook Peacefully in hospital on 3rd August 2022 aged 88 years. Dearly beloved wife of the late Joe and a much loved mam, grandma, great grandma and sister. Funeral service to take place at Centenary Methodist Church, Crawcrook on Friday 12th August at 10.00am prior to cremation at Mountsett crematorium. Family flowers only please, donations for St.Oswalds Hospice may be sent c/o 1 Kepier Chare, Crawcrook, Ryton, NE40 4TS. Tel 0191-4132318

John AYNSLEY

(Killingworth) Peacefully on 26th July, aged 76 years, John. A loved husband of Susanne. A loving brother of Carol, David and the late Raymond. Also a much loved uncle to all his nieces and nephews. John will be loved and forever missed by all his loving family and many friends. Would friends please meet for service at West Road Crematorium on Friday 12th August at 12:00 noon. Family flowers only by request, donations in lieu if desired to Ward 12, C/O Cramlington Hospital. A collection plate will be available at the Crematorium. Bright coloured clothing to be worn, no formal wear at family's request. All enquiries to: WS Taylor & Sons 2-3 Meadowfield Terrace Forest Hall NE12 9ES Tel: 0191 2709677

Anne BALLANTINE (West Monkseaton)

(West Monkseaton) Peacefully on 23rd July, aged 86 years. Beloved wife of the late John, much loved mum to Elaine and Graeme and nana to all of her Grandchildren. Would friends please meet for service and cremation at Tynemouth Crematorium on Friday 12th August at 11.15am. Family flowers only. Donations in lieu, if desired, to Alzheimer's Society for which a donation box will be available at the service. Enquiries c/o William Purves Funeral Directors, 40 Earsdon Road, Monkseaton. Tel: 0191 2523635

Allison Elizabeth (North Shields) BAXTER (Nee Hardy)

(Nee Hardy) (North Shields) Passed away on 28th July aged 52 years. A dear wife of John, much loved mam of Jonathan, Matthew, and Ben and adored daughter of Liz and David. Cherished sister of the late Sarah. She will be missed and loved by all. Please meet for the service at Tynemouth Crematorium on Friday 12th August at 12pm. Donations would be gratefully received in support of Cancer Research UK. E Turnbull and Son Albion Road North Shields NE29 0HE 0191 257 1201

Margaret (Meg) BEATON

(Formerly of Fawdon) Peacefully on 25th July, aged 91 years. Loving wife of the late Henry (Harry), much loved mum of Norman, Leslie and Mary, and mother in law of Maggie and John. Also a loving grandmother and great grandmother, she will be missed by all. Would family and friends please meet for service at the West Road Crematorium, Newcastle, on Tuesday 16th August at 12:45pm. Family flowers only please, donations if desired to Marie Curie Cancer Care. W.S. Harrison & Son, 155-159 Salters Road, Gosforth, Newcastle upon Tyne Tel: 0191 2858376

Pamela BELL (Illingworth)

(Illingworth) Pam, passed away after a long illness on 25th July, aged 65 years. Beloved wife to Tony, a much loved mother to Lisa and Anthony and their partners Joe and Jess, a devoted nana to Olivia, Jake and Ari and a loving sister to Jimmy, Carol, Mark and the late Susan. A beautiful person who will be sadly missed by all. Funeral service to take place at Whitley Bay Crematorium on Wednesday 17th August at 1:30pm. Family flowers only please, donations if desired to be split between the Children's Heart Unit at the Freeman Hospital and North Tyneside General Hospital Palliative Care Ward 5. For more information please visit https://www.justgiving.com/crowdfunding/inmemoryofpamelabell?utm_term=wrBAYVyJe

Ella BLACKBURN

(Longbenton) Peacefully but suddenly in hospital on 1st August aged 91 years. Ella, a dearly loved wife of the late Billy. A loving mam of Linda and Peter and a much loved mother in law of Gill. A Treasured nana of Jonathan, David, Elly and Anna. A Great grandmother of Francesca and Madeline. Also a loving sister and sister in law of John and Lily. Friends please meet for service at West Road Crematorium on Friday 19th August at 3pm. Floral tributes and enquiries to WS Taylor & Sons Ltd 2-3 Meadowfield Terrace Forest Hall NE12 9ES Tel. 01912709677.

Edna BLAIR (Armstrong)

(Armstrong) Passed away peacefully at Greenways Court, aged 88 years. Edna, beloved wife of the late Les, much loved mam of Janet and Ian, a dear grandma and great grandma and a friend to many. A funeral service will be held 1:15 on Wednesday 10th August at Mountsett Crematorium. Family flowers only, donations in lieu if desired, to Alzheimer's Research

June Rose (Wallsend formerly Killingworth) BLAKEY (Nee Gullon)

(Nee Gullon) (Wallsend formerly Killingworth) Peacefully in hospital on 25th July aged 83 years. Beloved wife of the late Wilbert John, a devoted mam of Christine, Carol and Judith, a much loved grandma of Paul, Adam and Rachael and a dearly loved sister of Roger and her many siblings gone before her. Friends please meet for funeral service at St. Bartholomew's Church, Long Benton on Friday 12th August at 10.00am followed by an interment in Benton Cemetery. Family flowers only. Donations in lieu, if desired, can be made at the Church to The British Heart Foundation.

Jean BOGGON

(Washington) Passed away peacefully in Sunderland Royal Hospital surrounded by her loving family on 22nd July 2022 aged 77 years. Jean, a beloved Mam of Gina and Lisa, a much-loved Mother-in-law of Michael, dearly loved Grandma of Ethan, Emily, Finley and Layton, a loving Sister of Kathleen, John and Ian and a dear Auntie and friend to many. Friends, please meet for service at Holy Trinity Church, Washington Village on Monday 8th August 2022 at 11:00am, followed by Cremation at Birtley Crematorium. Family flowers only please, donations in lieu of flowers can be made to Myeloma UK via a collection in Church. All enquiries to Walker & Morrell Funeral Directors, 4 West View, Washington. Tel: 0191 4164160

Colin BROWN

(Blyth) Peacefully on 19th July 2022, aged 79 years. Colin, beloved husband of the late Evelyn and partner of Jacqueline. Devoted dad of Diane and Angela. A loving grandad of Ryan and Andrew. Colin will be greatly missed by all his family and friends. A funeral service will take place at St Wilfrids Church, Blyth on Tuesday 9th August at 10:30am followed by a committal service at Cowpen Crematorium at 11:30am Family flowers only. Donations if desired to The Stroke Association. All enquiries to Co-op Funeralcare, Blyth. Telephone 01670 352880. Any dress code welcome to celebrate the life of Colin.

Patricia Ann BROWN

(North Shields). Pat (nee Fenton) sadly passed away on 24th July 2022, aged 79 years. Beloved wife of Ken, loved mam to Karen and Janet, mother-in-law to Ralph and Ryan and grandma to Anna and Lucy. She will be greatly missed by all who knew her. All family and friends welcome at the service at Tynemouth Crematorium on Friday 12th August at 2.15pm and afterwards to celebrate Pat's life at the Spread Eagle, Preston Village. Family flowers only.

Rhoda (nee Ridden) BROWN

(nee Ridden) (Pelaw) Late of Deckham. Peacefully at the Queen Elizabeth Hospital on 27th July 2022 aged 81 years Rhoda, dearly loved wife of the late Ron, a dear sister of John and Josie, Joan and John and the late Ken and Margaret, Tom and Joan, Dot and Charlie, Harry and Pat, also a much loved aunt to all the family. Service and cremation at Saltwell Crematorium on Friday 12th August at 1.45pm. Friends please meet at crematorium. Family flowers only please, donations in lieu if desired to Cancer Research. A donation may be made at the service. Afterwards all welcome at The Gateshead Bowling Club.

Amy BUCK (Wardley)

(Wardley) Passed away suddenly on 28th July 2022 aged 25 years, Amy. Cherished Daughter of Steve and Joan. Loved Step-Daughter of Gillian. A loving Sister of Jennifer. An adored Granddaughter of Val and the late Jack, Jan and Arthur. Much loved by all her Aunties, Uncles and Cousins. Amy will be greatly missed by Kenny and her best friend Amy D. A celebration of Amy's life will take place at Saltwell Crematorium on Wednesday 17th August 2022 at 12 noon. Would all guests please wear a splash of colour to reflect Amy's personality. Family flowers only please, donations may be left following the service to 'BEAT' (eating disorder charity). Amy will forever be in our hearts x

Colin BURRELL

(Rowlands Gill) Peacefully on Saturday 23rd July, aged 69. Colin, loving husband of the late Sheila, father to Thomas, father-in-law to Helen, grandad to Lillyana, Elyssia and Rowan. Service to be held at Mountsett Crematorium on Wednesday 10th August at 11.45am. Donations in lieu of flowers to Macmillan.

Joe CAIRNS

(Seaton Delaval). Formerly of Cullercoats. Suddenly in hospital after a short illness on 23rd July, aged 86 years. Joe, beloved son of Joe and Kitty, devoted husband of the late Win, dearest brother of Cathy, loving uncle of David. He will be greatly missed by all who knew him. Friends please meet at Whitley Bay Crematorium on Tuesday 9th August at 3.00pm. Donations in lieu of flowers if desired to MacMillan Cancer Support. A donation box will be provided at the service. Co-op funeralcare Algernon Place Whitley Bay NE26 2DT 01912525151

Isabel (Bell) CALLAWAY (Phillips)

(Phillips) (Bell) (North Shields) Formerly of Walker. Died peacefully on 19th July. Beloved Wife of the late William, much loved Mam of Lynn, Mother-in-law to John, and Gran to Charlotte and Abigail. Forever in our hearts and a huge miss. Funeral Service Tuesday 9th August 12:45pm at Tynemouth Crematorium and afterwards all welcome to Tamar Court in North Shields. Donations welcome to MIND, donation box available at chapel.

Irene CAMPBELL (nee Hogarth)

(nee Hogarth) (West Denton) It is with great sadness that we announce the death of Irene who passed away very peacefully on Sunday July 24th at Orchard Mews Care Home. Irene was the beloved wife of the late Clarry and dearly loved mother of Lynn, David & Julie, and will always be lovingly remembered. A service will be held at West Road Crematorium at 9:30am on Friday 12th August and afterwards at Benwell Hill Cricket Club. Family flowers only please, donations gratefully received for Alzheimer's Research.

Joan Storey CLASPER (Harwood)

(Harwood) (Benton) Passed away on Tuesday 19th July 2022, aged 89 years. Joan devoted wife of the late Joe, loving mother of Julie and Michael, much loved mother in law of Ken and Angela. Beloved grandmother of Kerry, Jill, Ellen and Anna, loving great grandma. Please meet for a celebration of Joan's life on Friday 12th August 2022 10:15 at the West Road Crematorium. Family flowers only please donations in lieu if desired to Dementia UK. All enquires to: Coop Funeral care North Shields Mill House Billy Mill Avenue North shields NE29 0QR 0191 2580025

Florence COLE

(Cowpen) Passed away peacefully at The Oaks on 29th July, aged 94 years. Florence, beloved Daughter of the late Wilfred and Gertude, much loved Sister of the late Mary and Samuel, dear Auntie to Ronnie and Lesley, Great Aunt to Jennifer and Great Great Aunt to Isabelle, Charlotte and Juliette. A funeral service and cremation will take place on Tuesday 9th August at Cowpen Crematorium at 3:15pm. Family flowers only please. Donations in lieu if desired, to Macmillan Cancer Care, for which a box will be provided at the crematorium. Enquiries to: Co-op Funeralcare Crofton House, Waterloo Road Blyth, NE24 1BU 01670 352880

Alan COMMONS

(Whickham) Suddenly on 28th July 2022 aged 80 years Alan. Dearly loved husband of Ros, much loved dad of Jon, dear father-in-law of Esther and loving grandad of Isaac and Lily. Funeral Service at Mountsett Crematorium on Friday 12th August at 12.30pm. Would friends please meet at crematorium. Family flowers only. Donations in lieu if desired to British Heart Foundation c/o Martin Rankin Funeral Directors, 7 The Square, Front Street, Whickham, NE16 4JB. All welcome afterwards at The Gibside Hotel, Whickham.

Ann (Killingworth) COOPER (Nee Glasper)

(Nee Glasper) (Killingworth) Passed away peacefully at home after a long illness bravely borne, with her devoted husband Norman by her side and surrounded by her loving family. Treasured mam of Raymond and daughter-in-law Julie. Loving nana of Zak. Dearly loved and cherished sister of brother Billy, sisters Mary, Cathy, Susan and the late Theresa. Ann will be sadly missed by her many nieces, nephews and all who knew and loved her. Family and friends please meet for service at West Road Crematorium on Friday 19th August at 12pm. Family flowers only please. Donations in lieu to Macmillan Cancer Care if so Desired. All welcome back to Killingworth Social Club for refreshments. WS Taylor & Sons Ltd 2-3 Meadowfield Terrace Forest Hall NE12 9ES Tel. 0191 2709677

Peter COYNE

(Wardley) On 25th July 2022 aged 74 years, Peter, dearly loved son of the late Janet and Stevie. Dearly loved brother of the late John and Sheila. Much loved uncle of Jayne, Paula, Paul and Shaun. Peter was much loved by all family and friends. Requiem Mass at St. Patrick's R.C. Church on Tuesday 9th August at 10:00am. Cremation to follow at Saltwell Crematorium. Friends please meet at Church. Family flowers only please, donations in lieu if desired to Parkinsons UK, a donation may be made at the Service. Afterwards everyone welcome at Heworth Golf Club. Rest in peace

Maureen CUNNINGHAM (Nee Laybourne)

(Nee Laybourne) (West Denton) In loving memory of a very special mum, sister, grandma and great grandma who left us so suddenly on the 25th July 2022, aged 82. Even though our hearts are broken and we are lost without you, we know you are at peace reunited with Grandma and Grandad. You will be forever in our hearts and thoughts and we love you and miss you always. Jamie, Susan, Simon and family Funeral Service at West Road Crematorium, 9th August 2022 at 11:00am. Donations welcome to Cancer Research UK

Joan CURRY (Nee BOWLES)

(Nee BOWLES) Wallsend. Joan passed away after a long illness bravely fought on July 27th aged 83 years. Beloved wife of the late Raymond, much loved mam of Pauline, Roger and the late Philip, loving nanna of Loren, Lisa, Euan and Lewis and a sister of the late Margaret and Molly. Joan will be very sadly missed. Family and friends please meet for service at Tynemouth Crematorium on Thursday August 11th at 3pm. Flowers may be sent care of H.Duckworth Funeral Directors, Cramlington or donations can be made at the service to the Progressive Supranuclear Palsy Association (P.S.P) All enquiries please call H.Duckworth on 01670713218

Tom 'Colin' (Whitley Bay) DANSKIN

(Whitley Bay) Passed away very peacefully with his family by his side on the 22nd July aged 94 years. A loving husband to the late Mary, father to Jane and Katharine and a proud grandfather, Colin will be always remembered and deeply missed. Please meet for the service at St Mary The Virgin Church, Whitley Bay on Thursday 11th August at 2pm. Family flowers only please with donations in lieu, if desired, in support of Chance to Shine. E Turnbull and Son Albion Road North Shields NE29 0HE 0191 257 1201

Bernard (Bernie) DIXON

(Whitley Bay) Passed away peacefully in St. Anne's Care Home on Wednesday 27th July 2022, aged 89 Years. Bernie, beloved husband of the late Ann, much loved father to Carol Ann. A loving grandfather of Catherine, Richard and his wife Victoria and great grandad to Adam. Bernie will be sadly missed by his family and many friends. Please meet for his service at Whitley Bay Crematorium on Wednesday 17th August at 3:00pm. Family flowers only please, donations in lieu if desired to Parkinson's UK. Afterwards, all welcome back to Whitley Bay Golf Club for refreshments. W.S. Harrison & Son, 17 Claremont Crescent, Whitley Bay NE26 3HL Tel: 0191 2528779

Joan (Low Fell) DODGIN

(Low Fell) Peacefully in hospital on 24th July aged 87 years, Joan (nee Tomlinson). Loving wife of the late Ronnie and a dearly loved Mam, Grandma, Great Grandma and Great Great Grandma. Also a dear sister and aunty. Friends invited to service at Saltwell Crematorium on Thursday 11th August at 2.30pm. No flowers please but donations in lieu may be made at the service for Emmaus North East E Bush Funeral Director 79-83 Old Durham Road Gateshead Tel: 0191 477 1726

Eustace (Eusy) DOUGLAS

(Eusy) Formerly of Denmark Street, Gateshead, passed away 25th July 2022, in hospital in Melbourne, Australia after a long illness bravely borne, aged 83 years. Loving husband of Marie, dad to Grant and Robert and a loving grandad. Brother to Bryan, his only surviving sibling. RIP

Catherine Anne (Nan) DYBALL

(Nan) Cramlington formerly Wallsend. Peacefully in Hartford Court Care Home, Cramlington on July 20th aged 97 years. Dearly loved Wife of the Late Ray, much loved Mam of Joan, Ian and Brenda. Mother-In-Law of Alan, Michael and Maria, Nana of Mark, Sean, Lynda, Neil, Lisa, Michael and Marcel, Great Nana of Jamie, Eve, Joseph and Thomas. Nan will be greatly missed by all who knew her. Family and friends please meet for service at Whitley Bay Crematorium on Friday August 12th at 1.30pm. Family flowers only please, donations in lieu if desired to CLAPA. All enquiries to H. Duckworth Funeral Directors, Cramlington. Tel:01670 713218.

Jytte ECKFORD

(Wideopen) Passed away peacefully at Kirkwood Court Care Home on 23rd July 2022, aged 96 years. Jytte, beloved wife of the late Colin. Devoted mother of Tony and a much loved grandmother and great grandmother. Jytte will be sadly missed by all her family and friends. Service to be held at West Road Crematorium on Wednesday 10th August at 3.30pm.

Arthur EDWARDS

(Bedlington) - Peacefully in hospital after a short illness on 23rd July. Beloved husband of Ada. Much loved dad of the late Eileen and husband Dave. Adored grandad of Claire and Lyndsey. Great grandad of Katie. Arthur will be greatly missed by all family and friends. Please meet for a funeral service at Cowpen Crematorium on Wednesday 10th August at 2:30 p.m. No flowers by request. Donations in lieu to The British Heart Foundation. A donation box will be available at the crematorium. All donations to Coop Funeralcare, Bedlington. Tel 01670 821111.

Elizabeth EDWARDS

(nee Harwood) (Whickham) Peacefully in hospital on 25th July 2022 aged 80 years Elizabeth, beloved wife of the late Ian. Funeral Service at Dunston Hill Methodist Church on Wednesday 17th August at 10.45am. Cremation to follow at Mountsett Crematorium at 11.45am. Would friends please meet at church. Family flowers only. Donations in lieu if desired to Ravensworth Road Methodist Church Dunston c/o Martin Rankin Funeral Directors, 7 The Square, Front Street, Whickham, NE16 4JB. All welcome afterwards at The Gibside Hotel Whickham.

Grace (Low Fell formerly Gosforth) ELLIOTT (Nee Moore)

(Nee Moore ) (Low Fell formerly Gosforth) Suddenly but peacefully on 29th July aged 84 years. Beloved wife of the late Sid and loving partner of the late Ken. A much loved mam of Michael and Susan, and mother in law of Susan and John. A dearly loved grandma of Angie, Christopher, James, Rebecca and Michael, and a very proud great-grandma. A dear sister to Peg, Bob, and the late Cath, May and George. Friends please meet for funeral service at Saltwell Crematorium on Thursday 18th August at 12 noon. Family flowers only but donations in lieu, if desired, may be made at the crematorium to The Great North Air Ambulance.

Gwendoline ENGLISH

Gwen passed away peacefully on July 22nd aged 61 years. Beloved wife of Peter, much loved mam of Colin, Tracy, Neil, Jonathan and Kimberly, devoted grandma and great grandma and a loving sister of Stephen, Michael and the late Joan. Gwen will be very sadly missed. Family and friends please meet for service at Cowpen Crematorium, Blyth on Monday August 8th at 2.30pm. Family flowers only please, donations in lieu if desired to the Macmillan Nurses. All enquiries to, H.Duckworth Funeral Directors, Cramlington. Tel 01670713218

Maureen FALCUS (née Milne)

(née Milne) (Walker) Peacefully at home with family by her side on Tuesday 26th July 2022, aged 83 years. Maureen, beloved wife of the late David, loving mam of Gillian and David, mother in law to Angie, devoted nana to Kirsty, Josh and Sarah, great nana to James, sister of Lyd, Jackie and the late Doris. Would family and friends please meet at the West Road Crematorium on Wednesday 10th August at 11:15am. Family flowers only, donations if so desired to Cancer Research. Afterwards all welcome back to the Walker Jubilee Club (upstairs) for refreshments. W.S. Harrison & Son, Shields Road, Byker, Newcastle upon Tyne NE6 2UD. Tel 0191 2655415.

Paul FLETCHER

(Wallsend) Suddenly on 26th July. Paul, missed terribly by his loving wife Carol and daughter Claire. Claire's partner Mick. Brothers Alan and David and Bella the dog! Death leaves a heartache no one can heal. Memories are treasures no one can steal. We will remember you no matter how long. You will always stay loved and remembered in every way. No tears, no verse, can ever say how much we will miss you every day. Always in our hearts. Friends please meet for service at Tynemouth Crematorium on Thursday 11th August at 12:00 noon. Floral tributes or donations in lieu if desired to The British Heart Foundation, a collection plate will be available at the Crematorium. Everyone welcome to the Lindisfarne Social Club, Wallsend following the service to continue the celebration of Paul's life. Floral Tributes and Enquiries to: WS Taylor & Sons 2-3 Meadowfield Terrace Forest Hall NE12 9ES Tel: 0191 2709677

Ian FRASER

Passed away suddenly on 19th July 2022. Loved and loving son of Joan and Jim Fraser (deceased) and brother of Lorna. A celebration of Ian's life will be held on Wednesday 3rd August at The Victory, 43 Killingworth Road, South Gosforth from 12 midday to 3pm.

Peter FULLER

(North Shields) Passed away peacefully on Thursday 21st July aged 77 years. Devoted husband to Pauline, dearly loved father to Andrew, father in law to Fiona and treasured grandpa to Henry and Thomas. Also a dear brother to Les, Irene, Norma, Sue, Evelyn and Joan and brother in law, cousin, uncle and friend to many. Funeral service to be held at Tynemouth Crematorium on Wednesday 10th August at 9:45am. Family flowers only please with donations gratefully received in support of the Sir Bobby Robson Foundation Fund and the Tynemouth Volunteer Life Brigade. E Turnbull and Son Albion Road North Shields NE29 0HE 0191 257 1201

Isabella GAIR

(Felling). Peacefully at home on July 24th aged 89 years, Isabel (nee Maddison). Dearly loved wife of the late Ken, dearly loved mam of Elaine and partner Jim. A much loved lady who will be sadly missed by all her loving family and friends. Friends please meet for service at Leam Lane Methodist Church on Tuesday 9th August at 1.30pm followed by cremation at Saltwell Crematorium at 2.30pm. By request no flowers, donations in lieu if desired may be made to the Great North Air Ambulance. A donation box will be available at both venues.

Stuart Anthony (Ponteland) GRAHAM

(Ponteland) As the result of an accident. On 18th July aged 53 years Stuart Anthony, dearly loved husband of Jan, dear dad of Liam, Lauren and Jamie, adored son of Dennis and Pamela a beloved nephew and cousin also son in-law of Edward and Margaret. Would friends please meet for service at St Matthew's Church Dinnington on Friday August 12th at 12.00noon followed by cremation at the West Road Crematorium Newcastle at 1.15pm. Family flowers only please, donations in lieu for St Matthew's Church. All enquiries please to James Hamilton Funeral Directors Darrell House Brunswick Village. Tel: 0191 2366243

David John GRAVES

(Gateshead) David passed away peacefully at home on 13th July 2022, aged 64 years. The world is a quieter place without you. Your eccentric charm and living life in true freedom. A truly unique spirit. Lost but never forgotten. David's Funeral will be held at Saltwell Crematorium on Friday 5th August 2022 at 10.30am. Family flowers only please. Donations welcomed in lieu of flowers to the RSPCA and the RSPB. We would also like to request mourners to wear black with a 'pop' of colour as we celebrate David's life. Wake information available after service. All enquiries to Regent Funeral Services 0191 4334499. Regent Funeral Services Regent Funeral Services Saltwell Road South Saltwell Park NE9 6DT

Frank GREAVES

(Low Fell) On 31st July 2022, aged 87 years, Frank. Dearly loved husband of Norma (nee Paterson), a very kind and gentle, much loved dad of Peter and daughter-in-law Jayne, a special grandad of Holly and William. Frank was much loved by all his family and friends. Service and cremation at Saltwell Crematorium on Tuesday 9th August at 3.15pm. Friends please meet at crematorium. Family flowers only please, donations in lieu if desired to Parkinson's UK and the Great North Air Ambulance Service. A donation may be made at the service. Afterwards everyone welcome at the A1 Allerdene Club.

Jonas HACKWORTH (Wallsend)

(Wallsend) On 24th July aged 73 years. Loving husband to Jean, devoted dad to Steven and Kelly, father-in-law to Jill and Olly and step-dad to Stephen and his wife Julie. A very much loved grandad and brother. Family and friends please meet for funeral service at Tynemouth Crematorium on Monday 8th August at 1.30pm. Family flowers only but donations in lieu, if desired, may be made at the crematorium to Alzheimer's Research UK.

Kathleen (Great Lumley) HAIGH

(Great Lumley) Peacefully on 30th July 2022 aged 74 years. Kathleen, beloved wife of Joe. Devoted mam of Michelle and Steven and mother in law of Davey and Lesley. Much loved grandma of Rachel and Andrew. A dear sister of Maria. Kathleen will be sadly missed by all her loving family and dear friends. Service at St Cuthbert's R.C Church, Chester le Street on Monday 15th August at 1.30 pm followed by cremation at Birtley Crematorium. Family flowers only. Donations in lieu will be gladly received in aid of Lindisfarne Care Home Residents Fund and Dementia UK. All enquiries to Co-op Funeralcare, Chester le Street (0191) 3871212

Catherine HALL

(Gateshead) Passed away peacefully at Fellingate Care Centre with the support and love of her sister Moira, who was by her side on 23rd July 2022 aged 86 years. Catherine will now re-join her loving Husband Norman and will be missed but not forgotten by her daughter Louise. Funeral service to take place at Saltwell Crematorium on Friday 5th August 2022 at 11:15am. Family flowers only please, donations in lieu of flowers to Dystonia Society via a collection at the Crematorium. All enquiries to Walker & Morrell Funeral Directors. Tel: 0191 4785415.

Shirley HALL (nee Gibb)

(nee Gibb) (Felling) Peacefully in Craigielea Nursing Home on 22nd July 2022 aged 87 years, Shirley, beloved wife of the late Jimmy, a much loved mam of Jeanette, Michael, Peter, Jimmy, Keenan, Raymond, Keith and Terry, a loved and loving mother-in-law, nana, great-nana, aunt and sister. Would family and friends please meet for funeral service at Christ Church, Felling on Tuesday 9th August 2022 at 10.30am followed by interment at Heworth Burn Cemetery at 11.15am. All enquiries to: Watson's Funeral Directors Ltd, 282 Old Durham Road, Gateshead NE8 4BP. Telephone (0191) 477 1484.

John William HANEY

Forest Hall Peacefully at home after a long illness on 28th July aged 54 years. Dearly loved son of Mary Ann and the late Robert, also a much loved partner of Karen. John will be sadly missed by all who knew and loved him Friends please meet for service at Blyth Crematorium on Friday 12th August at 1.00 pm. Flowers may be delivered to William Purves Funeral Directors Ashington, or donations in lieu if desired to Maggie's Cancer Charity for which a donation box will be available at the service. Everyone welcome back to Seghill Comrades Club afterwards.

Jaimie HETHERINGTON (Jamie)

(Jamie) (Blyth) Passed away peacefully in his loving wife Kay's arms, on 31st of July 2022 aged 44 years. Much loved Daddy of Oliver and Elliot Joe. Loving son of Christine and the late Joseph. Adored brother of Mark and his wife Kellie. Loving Uncle to James, Kiera and Paige. Jamie will be sadly missed by all who knew and loved him. Funeral service and cremation to be held at Cowpen Crematorium on Wednesday 17th August at 10:00am. Family flowers only please, donations in lieu if desired to Macmillan Nurses, a donation box will be available at the crematorium. Everyone welcome back to Newsham Side Club afterwards.

Sandra HIND (Sandie)

(Sandie) (Jesmond, formerly Newbiggin Hall and Sunderland) Ex Careers Adviser. Passed away peacefully on 20th July 2022, aged 71 years. Sandra, beloved wife of Edmund. Loving sister of Gloria and Shirley. Sandra will be sadly missed by all her family and friends. Service to be held at West Road Crematorium on Thursday 11th August at 1.15pm. William Geoffrey (Jeff) YOUNG

(Jeff) Of Battle Hill, Wallsend. Passed away on 29 July 2022, aged 75. Funeral for family and friends on Friday 12 August, 10.30am, Tynemouth Crem.

In Memoriams

Doreen ANDERSON (nee Richardson)

(nee Richardson) Its been the hardest thing losing you, you mean so much to me, You're always in my heart mam, and that's where you'll always be. You fell asleep so peacefully, and seemed to be in no pain. You just went to sleep, and never woke up again. I wanted to put my arms around you, and never let you go. I wish you could have stayed a while, but I know you had to go. You did not go alone as part of me went with you. I miss seeing you mam or even hearing your voice. I miss your laughs and the smile upon your face, you're always in my memories and in my broken heart. Rest in peace mam, until we meet again. Your loving Daughter Lesley, Son-in-law Kenny, Grandchildren Nicola, Claire, Stephen & Gavin, Great-Grandchildren Jayden and Logan.

Doreen ANDERSON (nee Richardson)

(nee Richardson) I miss you from your fireside chair, your loving smile and gentle air. Your vacant place that no one can fill, we miss you mam and always will. Your loving Daughter Eileen, Son-in-law Ali, Grandchildren Robert, Shaun, Amanda, David, Sophie, Steph, Vicky and Neil, Great-Grandchildren Leia, Daniel, Lydia, Natasha, Georgia, Connor, Jaxon, Jessica and Hallie. God bless you Mam, RIP.

Doreen ANDERSON (nee Richardson)

(nee Richardson) One year ago my heart was torn in two, when my beautiful mam closed her eyes for the last time. I wasn't ready to lose you mam but I know you were tired and I hope you are free from pain now. I miss your smile and hearing your laugh. I just miss you so much. You were the best mam, nana and great-nana in the world. You were loved so much by us all. I miss you and talk about you every day. I will never forget you mam and all the precious memories we made. Keep watching over us, until we meet again. Heartbroken Daughter Kath & Son-in-law Rob xx Gentle Jesus up above, Give our nana Dor all our love. We miss you so much. Love Grandchildren Shelley, Leanne, Michael, Stephen, Andy and Kailey, Great-Grandchildren Lauren, Ellie, Lewis, Olivia, Michael and Kyle. Always in our hearts xxx

Doreen ANDERSON (nee Richardson)

(nee Richardson) We can only fill that void that you left with those special memories that we have of you. Memories that have made me laugh, also made me cry. The hardship and the struggles that you faced every day were not in vain mam, and thanks to you the future generation of your brood won't have to face the same struggles. Your loving Son John, Grandchildren Cheryl and Scott. Can't believe it's been a year since you left us nana. I love and miss you more and more every day. Love your Granddaughter Emily.

Doreen ANDERSON (nee Richardson)

(nee Richardson ) We lost a mother with a heart of gold, how much we miss you will never be told. Who shared our troubles and helped us along, if you follow her footsteps we will never go wrong. Your loving Son Colin, Daughter-in-law Nicola, Grandchildren Kyle, Charlotte, Amy, Liam and Billy. RIP
